short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Try this neurologist's method: focus on bold letters, and your brain fills in the rest. Read Paul Graham's essays faster !

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finding Paul Graham's essays interesting but hard to focus on for long? Try this method, developed by a neurologist, to stay focused. Simply concentrate on the bold letters, and your brain will fill in the rest. This technique helps you read twice as fast and enjoy the satisfaction of reading Paul Graham's essays.
